author: Staff Reporter
text: Actor T. Rajendran along with his lawyer went to the Race Course Police Station in Coimbatore late Sunday evening to get more information on the case that was registered against his son and actor Simbu over the controversial ‘beep’ song.Mr. Rajendran met inspector V. Selvaraj to know if his son should appear at the police station before February 24 as directed by Madras High Court or more time could be given. The police told him that a decision on arresting Simbu would be taken based on the outcome of the inquiry.
title: Rajendran meets police officer
